quests.name: Unlock the Wisdom of the Ancients
quests.description: Embark on a quest to unlock the ancient wisdom contained within the 'Ancient Library.' Seek out the 'Spectral Tomes of Knowledge' and protect them from those who would misuse their power.

quests.name: Defend the Library's Secrets
quests.description: Defend the secrets of the 'Ancient Library' from a group of rogue sorcerers who seek forbidden knowledge. Confront the leader, 'Ebonmaw the Forbidden,' and put an end to their intrusion.

quests.name: Whispers of the Spirits
quests.description: Listen to the whispers of the ancient spirits dwelling in the library's archives. Aid them in finding closure and understanding the mysteries of their past.

quests.name: The Lost Codex
quests.description: Search for the 'Lost Codex,' a legendary tome said to contain forgotten spells and incantations. Traverse the labyrinthine stacks and outwit the guardians of knowledge to retrieve it.

quests.name: Arcane Anomalies
quests.description: Investigate a series of 'Arcane Anomalies' plaguing the library. Track down the source of these disturbances and confront the rogue mage, 'Aetherius the Unbound.'
